https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/61itgGKNnNFN4w36pDhFF4TACyY.jpg An art dramatic teacher, with melancholic eyes and some sort of charge over his shoulders, manages El Sotano Club by the nights, a comedy pub and gives comedy classes to other adult people by the day. All his life changes when he meets a very special student that breaks with all his schemas. Love, that strange thing. A Love in Times of Selfies
